string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 4,500 #Wbasic# #i4032488:# #t4032488:# #c4032488# 1 Able to proceed to 'To Kerning City' as next quest.
I've carefully inspected this map, and I found that the red on this map has been cursed with the blood of an animal. In order for you to completely remove the red, you must tame the souls of animals.
In order to do so, we need music...we need a microphone that will produce a special sound, and I can make it for you if you bring me a few materials. Will you find me what I need?

I need the following 3 items: 5 #rLong Strong Sticks#k (a drop item from #rStumps#k), 2 #rSmall Snail Shells#k(a drop item from #rRed Snails#k), and 1 #rPiece of White Pants#k (a drop item from #rDark Stumps#k).
Let me know when you're ready.
I know it wasn't easy for you to collect these items, but you did a fine job.\n\nFor your hard work, I will make you something special.
This #rAyan Mercury's Microphone#k can deliver the soul of the singer.\nIf you sing into the Map, deep inside your soul will reach out and release the curse.
Then the red part will naturally fade away.\n\nCome see me when you release the curse.
Please bring me 5 #rLong Strong Sticks#k, 2 #rSmall Snail Shells#k, and 1 #rpiece of White Pants#k.
